title: Hash ups
ingredients: ['------------Ingredients----------------', 'Enough oil to fry gently with', '2 cheap pork sausages', '3 mushrooms, sliced', '3 tomatoes, sliced', '1 small handful salad leaves (rocket, spinach, lettuce etc)', 'Worchester sauce', 'Tomato ketchup', 'Two eggs, whisked very lightly', '1 slice of bread, and enough butter to butter it', '--------------Equipment-----------------', '1 frying pan', '1 hob, burner etc', '1 toaster', '1 spatula', '1 knife, 1 fork', '1 plate', '1 small bowl', '1 whisk', '1 chopping board', '1 chopping knife']
